contentList.content: Deal [1] to all targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy.
Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down non-allied characters in front of you, and hitting them for [1]. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.

Release an unholy scream at enemies in a cone in front of you, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is below 50% Vitality, and setting Terrified for the duration.

Encore: If the target is below 50% Vitality, evoke a second screech on the target that deals Shadow damage.
Apply Snap Frozen and deal [1] in a cone. Enemies that are Frozen Solid and below 20% Vitality die instantly.
Deal [1] and Silence all enemies in a cone in front of you.
Create a magic field that shields allies in the area from incoming damage.
| Create a magic field that restores Magic and Physical Armour on allies in an area. |
Surprise your enemies by emerging from underground at target position.
Surprise your enemies by emerging from underground at target position.
|Apply Haste to yourself, then teleport away from danger. |
Apply Haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.
Leap through the air to a target position, dealing [2] and Taunting nearby enemies upon landing. Creates a fire surface on the area of impact.
Apply Haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.
Consume blood surfaces to restore Vitality.
Can't cast, attack, or interact with objects. Bock-bock-BOCKAW!
Destroy [1] on targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy.
Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down non-allied characters in front of you, and hitting them for [1]. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.
Characters in the cone that are Frozen and below 10% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive [1] and become Frozen.
Destroy [1] and silence all enemies within a cone in front of you.
Character is Crippled. Cured by Rested.
Character receives bonus damage based on missing Vitality.
Create a magical field that restores Magic and Physical Armour and increases elemental resistances on allies in an area.
Character is pinned in place and cannot move or teleport. Deals [1] each turn.
Fear has gripped this character. It cannot be controlled and will automatically try to run away. Cured by Clear-Minded, Enraged.
Character is frozen like an icicle. Cured by Magic Shell, Bless.
Surprise your enemies by emerging from underground at target position.
Leap through the air towards a target position, creating a fire surface upon landing.
Become Hasted and then teleport to target position.
Character is Knocked Down and cannot move.
Deals [1] each turn. Cannot be extinguished.
Character is turned to stone. Cured by Magic Shell, Bless.
Character is pretending to be dead, biding their time - and their skills! - and making enemies lose interest.
A shot that deals [1] and receives [2]% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.
Send a wave of healing to target another character. The wave travels to nearby allies, healing with each movement.
Destroys [1] and then tries to set Sleeping.
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1] of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface.
Shoot three flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [1].
Fly to a nearby point. Surfaces will not affect you while in flight, but clouds will.
An electrical jolt deals [1] to target character. Sets status Shocked.
Target is Marked, decreasing its ability to Dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.
Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [1].
A giant rock filled with sticky oil that deals [1]. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals [1].
Attack your target with meticulous aim, dealing [1] in one shot. When performed from Stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
Launch a magical missile from your staff that deals [1].
Icicles fall from the sky, chilling characters and dealing [1]. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground.
Scarecrows are called that for a reason...
Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies. Douse fire surfaces.
Rush forward in a straight line, to a designated point, hitting all enemies in your path with [1] and setting Knockdown.
Remove the following negative statuses from yourself: Silenced, Slowed, Crippled, Chilled, Shocked, Plague, Suffocating, Atrophy, Diseased, Infectious Diseased, and Shackles of Pain.
Grants you the power to blend in with any environment as if Invisible.
Control the forces of nature, increasing the movement speed of you and your allies by 1.5m (as long as your allies stay within 10m of you).
You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire.
Gain 1 Action Point immediately and a [2]% damage boost for 2 turns at the cost of [1] Constitution. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Regenerate Magic Armour for all allies around caster.
Allies in melee range redirect [1]% of received damage to you.
You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice.
You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage. You bleed electrified water.
Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid.
Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a Petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.
Allies near to you start slowly regenerating Physical Armour.
Deal [1] and Petrify enemies around you.
Fool enemies into thinking you're dead. Cooldown of skills will be paused. Any action you take will cancel this status.
You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison.
Restore the Physical Armour and Magic Armour of your shield.
Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned, Bleeding.
Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding you from sight.
Provides [1]. Your heart pumps liquid metal, creating a robust layer of Physical Armour. Restores Physical Armour each turn.
Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.
Deal [1] damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies.
Paralysed by electricity. Can be cured by Magic Shell, Bless.
Summons your trusty Soul Wolf, which can Howl and Bite enemies.
Transport pickupable items in the target area into your inventory.
Fully restore target character's Magic Armour. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad.
Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they will be healed!
Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.
Turn the target character into a chicken. Squawk!
Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Explode target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area.
Destroy [1] on target character, and set Acid status.
Cripple the target with a sweeping blow, and all characters around it. Deals [1].
For 2 turns, your target character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration.
Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their missing Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus.
Exchange Vitality percentages with target character.
Drain [1] from target character and gain that amount for yourself.
Perform three quick attacks, each dealing [1].
Increase the range of a target character's ranged attacks and skills by 4m.
Heals target for [2]. Cures Crippled, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, Diseased.
Curse the target to explode after one turn or on death, dealing [1] in 3m radius.
Destroy [1] on target character. Silence target.
Undead hands rise from underground, attacking enemy characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [1] to each character and sets Crippled.
Target character regenerates Vitality and Magic Armour according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.
Perform a heavy attack that deals [1].
Sing, causing enemies in the target area to become Mad. Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitoes to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing [1] and healing yourself.
Deal [1]. If your Physical Armour is higher than your opponent's, destroy all their Physical Armour. Can set Knocked Down.
Turn a nearby target to stone, incapacitating it. Deal [1]. Removes Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, and Crippled.
Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned, Bleeding.
Mark a target so that it will receive all the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Sets the Shocked status on a target within arm's length and deals [2].
Destroy [1] on target character. Set status that halves resistances.
Target totem or summon deals [1]% more base damage during its next turn, but then dies.
Target a character. Whenever this character ends a turn in combat, they immediately get a free turn.
Deal [1]. Set Suffocation and Silence on target.
Sink your fangs into the enemy, dealing [1] and setting Bleeding.

Deals [1] to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Magic Armour. Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive poison damage each turn.
A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.
Suffocates nearby characters and attempts to Silence them.
Fire a shot that deals [1] and receives [2]% bonus damage per 1m distance to target.
Throw your shield at an enemy dealing [1]. Shield can bounce to another enemy in 5m range.
Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies.
Deal [1] to target character and set Sleeping.
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1] of a random type and creates a corresponding surface.
Shoot three flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [1].
Will try to charm all in a [1] radius.
Hurl a jar of mind maggots into the fray, driving all characters in an 8m radius mad.

Launch a bolt of shadow at a target, dealing [1], or Shadow damage instead if the target is below 50% Vitality. Generates 1 Insanity.

Encore: If the target is below 50% Vitality, shoot a second bolt at the target that deals Shadow damage.

Launch 3 bolts of arcane energy towards targets, each destroying [1] on characters.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Hurl a wicked concoction, destroying [1] and transforming enemy characters into a harmless frog for 1 turn.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Unleash your magical gauntlet that deals [1] and stuns enemy units in a small area around the target.
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [1] of a random type and creates a corresponding surface.
Shoot three flaming daggers at targets of your choice, each creating a fire surface and dealing [1].
An electrical jolt deals [1] to target character. Sets status Shocked.
Shower an area in glitter dust, Marking targets. Marked targets cannot dodge or turn invisible.

Sabotage a target, causing them to Fumble their next spell cast.

Combo: Deals [1] upon triggering this effect.
Aim for the limbs, dealing [1] and Crippling target character.
Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [1].
Lob a giant rock with sticky oil that deals [1]. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals [1].
Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing [1] in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
Launch a magical missile from your staff that deals [1].
Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around and is broken by friendly fire.
Mad characters attack the most convenient target, regardless of allegiance.

Range: [2]
Launches a magical missile that inherits the power and damage type of the staff. The better the staff, the more damage this spell sows. Can target terrain.
Icicles fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing [1]. They create Ice surfaces where they hit the ground.
Create blood surfaces. Set Bleeding on enemies. Douse fire surfaces.
Rush forward in a straight line, to a point far away, hitting all enemies in your path with [1] and applying Knocked Down.
Borrow Action Points from your next turn.

Remove the following negative status effects from yourself: Slowed, Crippled, Chilled, Snap Frozen, Shocked, Suffocating, Atrophy, Diseased, Infectious Diseased, Silence, Plagued, Shackles of Pain, Ossified, Knocked Down, Stunned, Mad, Charmed and Terrified.
Grants you the power to blend in with any environment as if Invisible.
Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. While allies remain close, an aura improves their movement speed, accuracy, dodge and initiative.
You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire.
Gain 1 Action Point immediately at the cost of [1] Constitution. Causes you to Bleed.
Grant [1] to yourself and all nearby allies.
Nearby allies redirect [1]% of received damage to you.
You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice.
You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage. You bleed electrified water.
Deal [1] (based on your current Physical Armour) in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area (including yourself).
Wield Source to nullify the effect of Muted.
Grant [1] to yourself and all nearby allies.
Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a blessed water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid.
Snakes grow out of your head, giving you an Ossifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.
Grant [1] to yourself and all nearby allies.
Deal [1] and Ossify enemies around you. Enemies already Ossified become Petrified instead.
Fool enemies into thinking you're dead. Any action you take will cancel this status.
You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison.
Increase defenses temporarily, gaining [1] and [2] for 2 turns.
Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Create a smoke cloud around you and Sneak, hiding from sight.
Your skin turns to steel, granting a tremendous boon of [1] for 1 turn.
Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to attack you.
Deal [1] to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies
Character's limbs are broken, hindering movement.
Character is protecting nearby allies, and will receive 50% of their ally's incoming damage.
Carrying more weight than it should, this object cannot be moved.

Character's allegiance is confused. They will become Charmed at the end of the duration unless injured by another character.

Removed by Clear-Minded.
Character's limbs are broken, hindering movement.
defenses are bolstered, reducing incoming damage.
defenses are bolstered, reducing incoming damage.
defenses are bolstered, reducing incoming damage.
Character has lost the will to fight, suffering from weaker accuracy and defense. Removed by Clear-Minded.
Frozen to the spot, this character cannot move.
defenses are bolstered, reducing incoming damage.
Recently knocked off balance, struggling to regain posture.
Slowly being encased in stone, reducing movement. Becomes Petrified at the end of the duration unless removed by Blessed, Magic Shell, Arcane Stitch or Vaporize.
Defenses broken by a brutal assault.
Recovering from the emotional loss of a dear pet pal.
Recovering from the emotional loss of TWO pet pals! Why must life be so cruel?
Recovering from the emotional loss of THREE dear friends! Maybe life just isn't worth living anymore...
Defenses are bolstered, reducing incoming damage.
Character may only harm the target who provoked them.
Character is paralysed with fear, unable to move or defend.
Source magic is overpowering all Silencing effects.
Scarecrows are called that for a reason...
Suffocates nearby characters and attempts to silence them.
all current status effects on the target
Deals [1] each turn and reduces Physical Armour.
Receiving bonus damage based on missing Vitality, but immune to all forms of healing.
Character is pinned in place and cannot move or teleport. Deals [1] each turn.
Character gains twisted power by sacrificing their own blood. Deals [1] damage per turn.
Deals [1] each turn. Cannot be extinguished.
Deals [1] each turn and reduces Magic Armour.
Character cannot attack or use abilities requiring physical effort.
Fear has grippped this character. It cannot be controlled and will automatically try to run away. Cured by Clear-Minded, Enraged.
Consumes blood surfaces to restore Vitality.
Healing [1] per turn and benefiting from increased armour.
Character is frozen solid. Physical damage and fire damage shatter and melt the ice, respectively. Removed by Magic Shell and Bless.
Character is returning to a fight previously left and will arrive shortly.
Character is returning from the grave and will soon be active.
Character is frozen solid. Physical damage and fire damage shatter and melt the ice, respectively. Removed by Magic Shell and Bless.
Character is turned to stone. Cured by Magic Shell, Bless.
Actions impaired by electricity. Can be cured by Magic Shell, Bless.
Character has been recently knocked down and cannot defend or dodge. Armour and dodging are reduced.
Character can no longer use magic.
Character is pretending to be dead, making enemies lose interest.

Can't cast, attack, or interact with objects. Bock-bock-BOCKAW!
May also uncontrollably move away from enemies.
A testing summon for debug purposes
Summons your trusty Soul Wolf, which can howl and maul enemies, causing them to take damage from moving.
A scroll is a one time use spell. Use to start casting!
This elixir temporarily coats you in an invisibility spell. The bottle appears to be empty, but...
Teleport items in the area into your inventory and confiscate weapons from characters, applying Atrophy.
Fully restore a target's Vitality. Removes Frozen, Stunned, Petrified, Plague, Suffocating, Poisoned, Burning, Necrofire, Terrified, Silenced, Taunted, Mad.
Bless target character or surface. Removes Diseased, Decaying, Petrified, Stunned, Frozen, Plague, Silenced and Atrophy.
Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed!

Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.
Cannot be used on the especially strong-willed.
Turn target character into a chicken. Squawk!
Heal target character and create a blessed water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Explode target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area.
Deal [1] to target character and set Acid status.
Cripple the target with a sweeping blow, and all characters around it. Deals [1].
For 1 turn your target's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration.

Target character becomes immune to healing but receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their missing Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus, but suffer more damage each turn.
Deal [1] to target character, stealing their vitality for yourself and transferring all active status effects to them.
Deal [1] to target character and set Transfixed, locking them in place and weakening them.
Increase the range of a target character's ranged attacks by 4m and grant them a bonus to critical hit chance.
Heals target for [2]. Cures Crippled, Atrophy, Knocked Down, Blind, Silenced, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, Diseased.
Curse the target to explode in 2 turns or on death for [1].
Deal [1] to target character and apply Silenced.
Undead hands rise from underground, attacking enemy characters in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [1] to each character and sets Crippled.
Target character regenerates Vitality according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.
Perform a heavy attack that deals [1].
Set Invisible status on a target.
Polish target's armour to shining, improving its defense rating. Grants Deflecting for one turn.
Deal [1] and set a status that halves resistances.
Deal [1] and set a status that halves resistances.
If script successful, this should apply Hasted instead.

Blast the target's mind, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality, and setting Blinded for the duration.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, they are Blinded for 1 additional turn.

Sear the minds of all enemies in the area, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality. Generates 1 Insanity.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, evoke a second sear on the target that deals Shadow damage.

Curse the target with silence, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality, and setting Muted for the duration.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, they are Muted for 1 additional turn.

Conjure a curse of death upon the target, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, evoke a second curse on the target that deals Shadow damage and reset the cooldown.

Curse the target with unfathomable pain, dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, evoke a second curse on the target that deals Shadow damage and reset the cooldown.

Consume the target in a vortex of magic and shadow, cursing them to deal damage to their allies when they attack, and dealing [1] damage, or Shadow damage instead if the target is at or below 50% Vitality.

Encore: If the target is at or below 50% Vitality, evoke a second umbrage on the target that deals Shadow damage.
Deal [1] and set a status that halves resistances.

Deal [1] damage and Silence the target, preventing them from casting spells.

Hex damage: Deals [2].
---------------------------------------------------------------------
If the target is at or below Magic Armour, this skill deals additional Hex damage. This damage scales with Intelligence and levels.
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Sacrifice your summoned shadow to recover your Vitality.
Sing, causing enemies in the target area to become Mad. Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing [1] and healing yourself.

Steal [1] AP from a target, causing them to begin their next turn with [2] AP.

Combo: Reduces this skill's cooldown by 5.
Perform a devastating overhead strike, dealing [1] whilst applying Knocked Down and destroying your target's defenses for 2 turns.
Turn a nearby target to stone, slowing them to a crawl. Deal [1]. Removes Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned and Crippled.
Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals [1] to enemies and douses fire.
Restore Vitality of a target character over time. Restoration also cures Poisoned, Bleeding and Burning.
Mark a target to receive all of the damage you receive. Damage transferred in this way ignores any resistances the target may have.
Deal [1] and set a status that halves resistances.
Target totem or summon deals [1]% more base damage during its next turn, but then dies.
Target a character. Whenever this character ends a turn in combat, they immediately get a free turn.
Deal [1]. Set Suffocating and Silence on target.
Sink your fangs into the enemy, dealing [1] and causing them to take damage on movement, denying them escape.

Deals [1] to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area. Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive poison damage every turn.

Range: [1]
Charmed status temporarily turns a target's allegiance around.
|Crippled status prevents target from walking or running.|

Range: [1]
When you are invisible, enemies cannot see you or target you directly.
Invisibility breaks when casting or attacking, or when detected.

Range: [1]
Stunned makes target unable to move or act.
Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing.

Target range: [2]
Target can be moved [3] away from its position.

Select item or character first, then select its destination.
A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Sneaking, Burning and Slowed.
|Line of intense heat that deals [1] damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind.|
